title: Himi 98
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
’Eiki Laumālie lelei,
Kuo u fakahouhau’ia
‘Oua na’a ke li’aki,
‘A e angakovi ko au.
2.
Ko e mo’oni ‘aupito,
‘Oku lahi ‘eku hia;
Mo ‘eku fa’a fu’ifu’i,
‘A e ngāue lelei ‘a ‘au.
3.
Lahi ‘eku angatu’u
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona;
Ko e fai kovi lahi au,
‘I he kakai kotoa pē.
4.
Ka koe’uhi, ko Sīsū;
Ko hoku fakalaloa,
‘I ho nima to’omata’u:
Ke ke fakamo’ui au.
5.
Ko hoku hūfanga ia,
‘I he’eku angahia;
‘Eiki fakamolemole,
‘Eku kovi kotoa pē. *
